body: I am trying to create a window material, but I can't find the component HoneyBee_Add to Energy Plus library. I don't have it here, I already have looked everywhere
topic: Trying to create window materials: Can't find the component HoneyBee_Add to Energy Plus library

replies.body:
Iris,

Look for it at group 6 in HB tab.

If you don't have it there you probably have a faulty installation, so install again (or copy the files to your C:\Users\USERNAME\AppData\Roaming\Grasshopper\UserObjects directory).

-A.

I copyed and past to my canvas the component from a file chris uploaded in his video tutorial and it worked! Now it is appearing as well at group 6 in HB tab, and it wasn't before. Everything is working fine now.

Thanks for the answer Abraham!
